functionality.name: Shopping Cart
functionality.description: A feature to manage shopping cart items, calculate costs, and facilitate the checkout process.

requirements.description: The system must display the products in the cart with their names, prices, quantities, and total cost per product.
The system must allow users to increase or decrease the quantity of each product.
The system must automatically recalculate the total product cost when the quantity is updated.
The system must display the shipping cost for each product separately.
The system must provide a 'Remove' option for each product.
The system must inform the user if an item in the cart is no longer available for purchase (e.g., 'paused' status).
The system must allow users to proceed to checkout, showing a total that includes product and shipping costs.
The system must display the products added to the cart with the product name, quantity, availability, and price.
The system must allow the user to modify the quantity of products directly from the cart interface.
The system must calculate the total price of the products in the cart and display it, including any discounts.
The system must provide options to remove items, save items for later, and proceed to checkout.
The system must allow the user to choose the shipping destination and display the corresponding shipping costs.
The system must display the total amount to be paid, combining product and shipping costs, and offer a button for the next step of the purchase process.

epics.description: Manage products in the shopping cart, including viewing, modifying, and removing items.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to view the products in my cart with names, prices, quantities, and total cost per product.

tasks.description: Design and implement the interface to show cart items.
Create logic to calculate and display the total cost per product.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to increase or decrease the quantity of products in my cart.

tasks.description: Implement buttons to increase or decrease product quantities.
Create logic to automatically update the product cost when quantity changes.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to remove products from my cart.

tasks.description: Create a button to remove products from the cart.
Implement logic to recalculate the total cart value after removing a product.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be notified if a product in my cart is no longer available.

tasks.description: Implement logic to verify if products are available.
Show notifications for products that are no longer available.

epics.description: Allow users to view and manage shipping costs associated with their products.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see the shipping cost for each product separately.

tasks.description: Implement components to show shipping costs for each product.
Create logic to retrieve and display shipping costs.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to select the shipping destination to calculate the corresponding shipping costs.

tasks.description: Create a UI to select the shipping destination.
Implement logic to calculate and display costs based on the selected destination.

epics.description: Facilitate the checkout process by displaying a summary of the total cost and providing options for finalizing the purchase.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see the total cart amount, including product and shipping costs.

tasks.description: Create a summary section displaying the total amount with a breakdown.
Implement logic to include applicable discounts in the total.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save products in my cart for later purchase.

tasks.description: Create an option to save products for later.
Develop logic to manage and display saved products.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to proceed to the payment process from the cart.

tasks.description: Create a button to initiate the checkout process.
Develop logic to transition from the cart to the payment interface.
